tool_description: A data scraper that allows you to get data information from YouTube channels and videos.
title: YouTube Data Scraper

api_list.name: Video Full Information
api_list.description:
**Video Full Information**

This endpoint allows you to get the data information about the YouTube video by specifying its id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/video/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

snippet.title: API Project! Word Association Game
snippet.description:
You need to sign up here to follow along: https://bit.ly/rapidapi-hub

In this video I show you how to make a Word Association Game using an API. This project is great for those looking for fun projects to make with unique APIs.

00:00 Introduction
01:07 Exploring the API
03:19 Setting up our React App
07:32 Getting data into our App
12:55 Selecting Levels
27:29 Mapping out questions onto cards
34:19 Checking for correct Answers and adding to arrays using useState
40:37 Disabling multiple buttons with React Hooks
44:30 Displaying the score
46:19 Styling
52:40 .env files in React
 56:10 Where to go next - build a NodeJS backend

Final code available here: coming soon
Part 2 for a NodeJS backend:  coming soon
___
‚≠ê Check out my IDE here and get 1 month free: https://jb.gg/get_webstorm

‚≠ê New to code and none of this is making sense? Watch my '12hr+ YouTube Coding Bootcamp' in which you will learn HTML, CSS and JavaScript Fundamentals completely from scratch. It's on my channel and its 100% free.

‚≠ê In most videos I use Tabnine as my A.I autocompletion tool. You can download it for free here (I get no commission from this link, but am in a partnership): http://bit.ly/tabnine-top-tool

‚≠ê You can get a blockchain domain with my affiliate link here: http://bit.ly/get-a-crypto-domain

‚≠ê If you would like to buy me a coffee, well thank you very much that is mega kind! : https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aniakubow

‚≠ê Sign up for weekly coding tips from my newsletter partnership: https://bit.ly/JS-tips

You can also find me on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ania_kubow
Instagram: https://instagram.com/aniakubow

api_list.name: Video Status
api_list.description:
**Video Status**

It retrieves the status of the YouTube video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/video/status/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Video Content Details
api_list.description:
**Video Content Details**

It retrieves the content details of the YouTube video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/video/cd/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Video Player
api_list.description:
**Video Player**

It retrieves the embeddable YouTube video player.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/video/player/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

channel.title: Code with Ania Kub√≥w
channel.description:
Hello everyone. 

My name is Ania Kubow and I am a Software Developer (ex-Eurostar) who quit the rat race to focus on my channel and teach others how to code by building retro Games and awesome projects. I am also part of the core team @FreeCodeCamp. You can find me putting out videos on there, as well as on my own channel every Wednesday (and sometimes an extra one during the week too)!

Born in Poland and raised in the UAE, I graduated from Dubai College majoring in Math, Physics and DesignTech before moving to the UK to attend University. Fun fact: I have worked as a Financial Derivatives Broker in Singapore and London in a past life.

What I teach:
JavaScript, React, React-Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, GraphQL, Serverless Functions, DataBase work and so much more!

PLN from UAE then SGP  üáµüá±üá¶üá™üá∏üá¨üá¨üáß
Please Subscribe for upcoming releases, and don‚Äôt forget to press the bell icon.

For contact:
Twitter: @ania_kubow
Instagram: @aniakubow

body.title: API Project! Word Association Game
body.description:
You need to sign up here to follow along: https://bit.ly/rapidapi-hub

In this video I show you how to make a Word Association Game using an API. This project is great for those looking for fun projects to make with unique APIs.

00:00 Introduction
01:07 Exploring the API
03:19 Setting up our React App
07:32 Getting data into our App
12:55 Selecting Levels
27:29 Mapping out questions onto cards
34:19 Checking for correct Answers and adding to arrays using useState
40:37 Disabling multiple buttons with React Hooks
44:30 Displaying the score
46:19 Styling
52:40 .env files in React
 56:10 Where to go next - build a NodeJS backend

Final code available here: coming soon
Part 2 for a NodeJS backend:  coming soon
___
‚≠ê Check out my IDE here and get 1 month free: https://jb.gg/get_webstorm

‚≠ê New to code and none of this is making sense? Watch my '12hr+ YouTube Coding Bootcamp' in which you will learn HTML, CSS and JavaScript Fundamentals completely from scratch. It's on my channel and its 100% free.

‚≠ê In most videos I use Tabnine as my A.I autocompletion tool. You can download it for free here (I get no commission from this link, but am in a partnership): http://bit.ly/tabnine-top-tool

‚≠ê You can get a blockchain domain with my affiliate link here: http://bit.ly/get-a-crypto-domain

‚≠ê If you would like to buy me a coffee, well thank you very much that is mega kind! : https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aniakubow

‚≠ê Sign up for weekly coding tips from my newsletter partnership: https://bit.ly/JS-tips

You can also find me on:
